Description: Postcard; printed paper; shows the port and offices of the Suez Canal Company at Port Said, with assorted boats.
Producer name: Published by: The Cairo Postcard Trust
Curator's comments: Old card; very good condition; used, dated 24th April 1920 but either passed by hand or in an envelope. The message reads: "Dear Valerie, We shall soon be in England now and are all longing tio see you all. Granny & Auntie ... have come a long way to see you - it is four weeks today since we left Sydney & we hope to reach Plymouth on Sunday. Lots of love from ...".
